channel.title: Setting up a MSN Bot
channel.description:
Okay i set up a msn bot today and i finished it all except one problem
I have to accept people when they try to add me therefore me having to be at the computer.. which would be pointless since its a bot..
Now i went under preferences and i found this "[ ] Only people on my Allow list can see my status and send me messages" i made it un-checked so people would not have to add me to chat..
Except when someone adds me it still ask the bot to accept them... and if i just ignore that they wont be able to chat with me.. How come?

item.title: Setting up a MSN Bot
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

Okay i set up a msn bot today and i finished it all except one problem

I have to accept people when they try to add me therefore me having to be at the computer… which would be pointless since its a bot…

Now i went under preferences and i found this “[ ] Only people on my Allow list can see my status and send me messages” i made it un-checked so people would not have to add me to chat…

Except when someone adds me it still ask the bot to accept them… and if i just ignore that they wont be able to chat with me… How come?
